name: docusaurus-openapi-typedoc
description: Docusaurus with OpenAPI and Typedoc and Lunr Search

scripts.docs: concurrently "npx docusaurus serve --dir ./docs-dist" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && opener http://localhost:3000"
scripts.docs:build: rm -rf ./docs-dist; mkdir ./docs-dist; NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx docusaurus clean-api-docs  all --all-versions ; NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx docusaurus  gen-api-docs all  --all-versions ;  DOCUSAURUS_IGNORE_SSG_WARNINGS=true npx docusaurus build --out-dir ./docs-dist; npm run docs
